langModel

Class NaiveLanguageModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • langModel.NaiveLanguageModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageModelInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LaplaceLanguageModel

    public class NaiveLanguageModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LanguageModelInterface
    Class NaiveLanguageModel: class implementing the interface LanguageModelInterface by creating a naive language model, i.e. a n-gram language model with no smoothing.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2017)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected NgramCountsInterface ngramCounts
      The NgramCountsInterface corresponding to the language model.
      protected VocabularyInterface vocabulary
      The vocabulary of the language model.

      Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getLMOrder

        public int getLMOrder()
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModelInterface
        Getter of the language model order. In practice it will get the maximal order of the NgramCountsInterface structure.
        Specified by:
        getLMOrder in interface LanguageModelInterface
        Returns:
        the maximal order of the language model.

      • setNgramCounts

        public void setNgramCounts(NgramCountsInterface ngramCounts)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModelInterface
        Setter associating the current language model to a NgramCountsInterface object. It also scans the set of ngrams of the ngram counts structure and builds a vocabulary with it.
        Specified by:
        setNgramCounts in interface LanguageModelInterface
        Parameters:
        ngramCounts - the NgramCountsInterface object to set.

      • setVocabulary

        public void setVocabulary(VocabularyInterface vocab)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModelInterface
        Setter associating the current vocabulary to a VocabularyInterface object.
        Specified by:
        setVocabulary in interface LanguageModelInterface
        Parameters:
        vocab - the VocabularyInterface object to set.

      • getNgramProb

        public java.lang.Double getNgramProb(java.lang.String ngram)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModelInterface
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given n-gram, using the NgramCountsInterface structure. An implementation can consider the Laplace backoff smoothing. Another one can compute the log-probability instead of the probability...
        Specified by:
        getNgramProb in interface LanguageModelInterface
        Parameters:
        ngram - the n-gram whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given n-gram.

      • getSentenceProb

        public java.lang.Double getSentenceProb(java.lang.String sentence)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModelInterface
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given sentence, according to its n-grams.
        Specified by:
        getSentenceProb in interface LanguageModelInterface
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given sentence.
